title: riot fix ur game
body:
this is absolutely despicable. your actions are horrible. how can you let this happen theres always an issue with your servers no matter how much money you turn in or the number of staff you hold. 

yesterday it let me see my friends but now, not anymore back to being bugged. just bad man. i posted the support ticket and i got the worst answer possible eventho i provided all my information. it took 70 hours to get a response in the first place, and the answer was that they cannot give me a time when this is fixed, meaning it will take another week or so.

THE SADDEST PART OF ALL IS THAT THEY ONLY FIXED THE STORE TO WORK BUT THE FRIEND LIST STAYS DISCONNECTED. BRAVO.

*pukes*

replies.body: A full fledged fix is still being worked on for the login and chat issues. Some issues are complicated and take a significant amount of time to fix, like this one.
It looks like a specialist is assisting you with this in your ticket.  Please be sure to follow-up with the requested information in order to help you out further.  Thanks for your patience!
